maqras.text: 69|1|gipilko chaj-aol nal
69|2|gipilko chaj-aol nal-ilan mueos-inga
69|3|mueos-i geudaeege gipilko chaj-aol nal-i mueos-injileul allyeo jul geos-inga
69|4|ssamudeu bujoggwa adeu bujog-eun daejaeang-ui nal-eul bujeonghayeossnola
69|5|ssamudeu bujog-i geughan-ui gotong-eulosseo pamyeoldoeeossdamyeon
69|6|adeu bujog-eun hoghan-ui sanaun balam-eulosseo pamyeoldoeeossnola

69|7|geubunkkeseo geugeos(balam)eul guljongsikisim-e (balam-eun) ilgob bamgwa yeodeolb naj dong-an geudeul-eul deopchigo hulyeossnola. geulihayeo geu ttae geudaeneun muliga gokkulajyeo iss-eum-eul boni geudeul-eun machi sseuleojyeo beolin yajasuui momtong-gwado gatdeola
69|8|geuleoni geudaeneun geudeul jung-e nam-a issneun eotteon geos-ilado bol su issneunga
69|9|palaowa geu ijeon-ui jadeulgwa dwijibhyeojin ma-eul(jumindeul)eun joeleul gajigo wassnola
69|10|geuleohge geudeul-eun geudeul junim-ui sado-e bulboghayeoss-euni geubunkkeseoneun geudeul-eul gyeoglyeolhi pamyeolsikisyeossnola
69|11|sillo naneun mul-i gyeong-gyeleul neom-eoseoss-eul ttae geudaedeul-eul bangjue taewossnola
69|12|geulihayeo naega geugeos-eul geudaedeul-eul wihan tteoollim-eulo dugo, myeongsimhaneun gwiga geugeos-eul myeongsimhagi wiham-ila
69|13|ije napal-e sum-i han beon bulligo
69|14|daejiwa sandeul-i deulliuni geugeosdeul-i hanbeon-e sansanjogag-i nadeola
69|15|geuleohge geunal, pihal su eobsneun nal-i dagchyeowassnola
69|16|haneul-eun gallajyeoss-euni geugeos-eun geunal heuneulheuneulhadeola
69|17|cheonsadeul-eun geugeos(haneul)ui yeoleo kkeutjalag wie iss-eul geos-imyeo, geudeul(cheonsadeul) wie issneun yeodeolb(cheonsadeul)i geunal geudae junim-ui gwonjaleul tteobadchil geos-ila
69|18|geunal geudaedeul-eun deuleonage doel geos-ini geudaedeul-ui eotteohan naemilhan haeng-wido sumgyeojiji anh-eul geos-ila
69|19|gilogbuleul jasin-ui oleunjjog-eseo bad-eun janeun malhal geos-ini “ibosio. geudaedeul-eun naui gilogbuleul ilg-eusio”
69|20|“sillo naneun naui gyesan gyeolgwaleul majdagtteulil geos-ila hwagsinhayeossso”
69|21|geulihayeo geuneun manjogseuleon salm-eul yeong-wihadeola
69|22|jigohan cheongug-eseola
69|23|geugos(cheongug)ui gwasil-eun deuliwojyeo issnola
69|24|geudaedeul-eun swii meoggo masila, jinan nal geudaedeul-i haenghan il-e daehan daegala
69|25|gilogbuleul jasin-ui oenjjog-eseo bad-eun janeun malhal geos-ini “naega naui gilogbuleul badji anh-assdamyeon joh-ass-eul geos-eul!”
69|26|“naega naui gyesan gyeolgwaga mueos-inji mollassdamyeon joh-ass-eul geos-eul!”
69|27|“geugeos(jug-eum)eulo da kkeutna beolyeossdamyeon joh-ass-eul geos-eul!”
69|28|“nae jaesan-i na-ege botaem-i doeji moshaneunguna”
69|29|“nae gwonlyeogdo na-egeseo salajyeo beolyeossguna”
69|30|geudaedeul(cheonsadeul)eun geuleul jab-a pobaghala
69|31|geuleon hu taoleuneun bul(jiog)eulo geuleul bultaeula
69|32|geuleon hu gil-iga chilsib cheog-in saseul sog-eulo geuleul jib-eoneoh-eula
69|33|sillo ijeon-e geuneun gajang wieomhasin hananim-eul midji anh-assnola
69|34|geuneun ttohan bul-uhan jadeul-eul meog-ineun ildo gwon-yuhaji anh-assnola
69|35|geuleohgie oneul yeogiseo geuege hyeol-yug-eun eobs-eumyeo
69|36|goleum ioeeneun meog-eul geos-i eobsnola
69|37|geugeos-eul meogneun janeun ojig joejieun jadeul ppun-ila
69|38|geuleoni naneun geudaedeul-i boneun geos-eul dugo maengsehanola
69|39|geuligo geudaedeul-i boji moshaneun geos-eul dugo maengsehanola
69|40|jinsillo geugeos-eun myeong-yeloun sadoui mal-ini
69|41|geugeos-eun siin-ui mal-i anila. geudaedeul-i midneun geos-eun jogeum-il ppun-ideola
69|42|geugeos-eun jeomsulgaui maldo anila. geudaedeul-i gip-i saeng-gaghaneun geos-eun jogeum-il ppun-ideola
69|43|man-yuui junim-eulobuteo naelyeoon geos-ila
69|44|man-yag geu(muhammadeu)ga na-e gwanhae yeoleo maldeul jung-ui ilbuleul jieonaessdamyeon
69|45|naneun geuleul ganglyeoghi umkyeojab-ass-eul geos-ila
69|46|geuleon hu sillo naneun geulobuteo daedongmaeg-eul kkeunh-eo beolyeoss-eul geos-ila
69|47|geuleom-edo geudaedeul jung eotteon nugudo geubun-eul galomagji moshal geos-ila
69|48|sillo geugeos(kkulan)eun (hananim-eul) gyeong-oehaneun jadeul-eul wihan tteoollim-ila
69|49|jinsillo naneun geudaedeul jung-e jinlileul bujeonghaneun jadeul-i iss-eum-eul algo issnola
69|50|jinsillo geugeos(kkulan)eun bulsinjadeul-ui aetongham-ila
69|51|geuligo jinsillo geugeos(kkulan-eun) hwagsilhan jinlila
69|52|geuleoni geudaeneun gajang wieomhasin geudae junim-ui ileum-eul deunop-ila
70|1|yoguhaneun jaga dagchyeool beol-eul yoguhayeossdoda
70|2|(geu beol-eun) bulsinjadeul-eul wihan geos-euloseo, geugeos(beol)eul jeojihal jonjaeneun eobsnola
70|3|(geu beol-eun) seungcheon-ui gil-eul soyuhasin hananim-eulobuteo (oneun geos-ila)
70|4|geunal cheonsadeulgwa yeonghon-i geubunkkelo ollagani geunal-ui gigan-eun omannyeon-ila
70|5|geuleoni geudaeneun aleumdabge innaehala
70|6|sillo geudeul-eun geugeos(beol)eul meolge bojiman
70|7|naneun geugeos(beol)eul gakkabge bonola
70|8|geunal haneul-eun eong-gin gileumcheoleom doel geos-ila
70|9|geuligo sandeul-eun yangteolcheoleom doel geos-ila
70|10|ttohan hyeol-yug-eun (daleun) hyeol-yug-e daehae mudji anh-eul geos-ila

70|11|geudeul(hyeol-yug)i geudeul(daleun hyeol-yug)eul boge doem-edo (seoloui anbuleul mudji anh-eul geos-ila). aghaeng-eul jeojileun janeun geunal-ui jingbeol-eul beos-eonagi wihae jasin-ui jason-eul momgabs-eulo bachil suman issdamyeon hago galmanghadeola
70|12|jasin-ui baeujawa jasin-ui hyeongjewa
70|13|jasin-eul gamssajudeon gakkaun chincheoggwa
70|14|jigusang-e issneun moduleul bachyeoseolado geugeos(geudeul-ui momgabs)i geuleul guhae jugil (galmanghadeola)
70|15|geuleohji anhnola. geugeos(jiog)eun jag-yeolhaneun bulgil-ila
70|16|(jiog-eun) meoli kkeobjil-eul beosgyeo naemyeo
70|17|kkongmunileul ppaemyeo dol-aseossdeon jaleul buleul geos-ila
70|18|(jaesan-eul) mo-eugo ssah-a dudeon ja(leul buleul geos-ila)
